channel.title: Gabriel R. Schleder
channel.description: Recent content on Gabriel R. Schleder

item.description: Iâ€™m a PhD graduate student at the Universidade Federal do ABC advised by Prof. Adalberto Fazzio, Director of the Brazilian Nanotechnology National Laboratory (LNNano/CNPEM). My research interests are in computational materials science, especially in areas related to condensed matter physics and nanoscience, high-throughput Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, and Machine Learning techniques.
